answers.text:
Hi Robert, 
I was able to find two resources that touch on landslide mitigation and some of the related financial aspects. I hope you find these useful and that other local government officials with first hand experience weigh in on this question as well. 
-FEMA Disaster Recovery Guide http://webapps.icma.org/pm/9102/public/cover.cfm?author=christine%20becker&title=disaster%20recovery%3A%20%20a%20local%20government%20responsibility
-Natural Hazard Mitigation Planning Community Guide icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/301864
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Robert McLaurin
text: I am looking to contact managers who have had experience mitigating moderate sized landslides.  I am interested in learning about mitigation techniques, and how mitigation costs were allocated (public versus private funding)
title: Landslide Experience
